description:
Charming pre-war 1 bed with fire place, located in the heart of West Village walking distance from Soho, Chelsea, Highline and Union Square. Elevator building, renovated kitchen with washing machine in the building. Quiet and overlooking courtyard.

Prime location in the West Village

Lots of cafés and restaurants - quiet and lots of light.

Subway L, F, M, 1, 2, 3, E
name: 1 Bdr West Village Prime Location
review: This is a very nice 1 bedroom apartment in the middle of the West Village community. The apartment is very cosy, comfortable, clean and well maintained. Also quiet in the back part of the (lovely and also well-kept) building. Bleaker Street, W 4th Street around the corner as well as many restaurants, coffee shops and supermarket. Plus fast, direct subway ride to midtown. I was in town for business and going back to the apartment at the end of the day was a very welcome 'retreat' . Highly recommended.
